data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=5rL5Klp9CJcQ7kNvgFPAlPV&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AMvQW_i5GAIqswyegfoQ0LH&oh=00_AYADfk0Rw61Sk8HPkqghV291sPBk-eIWT-pEkds3_-1T9A&oe=66DD88B7)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=nJMmVOdtvpYQ7kNvgFr0fYV&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AMvQW_i5GAIqswyegfoQ0LH&oh=00_AYDAw8YnZ73TSldsu-3avM1baqbswR4X8isTvxAb78h3IA&oe=66DD9652)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003262_985625342809911_4235982824831484550_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=40Nh9-jqaDUQ7kNvgGnTMCJ&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AMvQW_i5GAIqswyegfoQ0LH&oh=00_AYAk_mxzYLSDmnbHB0_mcZOnr_xKsv2JlIo99vIT9S1cJQ&oe=66DD8189)
